name: Tunescape
description: Check out new VR experiences without buying more apps! Browse shared tunescapes, or create and share your own with building and animation tools that let you create whatever you can think up.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 10 Processor: Intel i-5500 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or equivalent Storage: 380 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
